event.title: 12/25 Tokyo Christmas Party @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya * All-You-Can-Drink * 1000円OFF
event.description:
Enjoy All-You-Can-Drink and make lots of new friends at Tokyo’s #1 Christmas Party 2018 !!!

1000 Yen OFF with reservation and all details at:
12/23 Christmas Party Shibuya @ VANDALISM TOKYO http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=xmas -
12/24 X’mas Party Shibuya @ CROSS POINT TOKYO http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=christmas -
12/25 Merry Xmas Party @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=christmas_party -
12/28 …TBA…
12/29 Intl. Party Shibuya @ LAUREL TOKYO http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=shibuya_friends_party -
12/31 Tokyo Countdown Party 2018-2019 http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=countdownparty -
Japanese Guys: 2000 Yen
Japanese Girls: 1000 Yen
Foreign Guys: 1000 Yen
Foreign Girls: FREE !!

- Meet hundreds of people at Tokyo’s #1 Christmas Party!!!
- All-You-Can-Drink Cocktails, Beer, Wine, Softdrinks etc.
- Shake your body to the best christmas songs and latest hits
- “Ho Ho Ho” Meet the REAL Santa Clause and his helpers!!!
- Feel free to wear your Ugly Christmas Sweaters
- Let’s get rednosed like Rudolph together !!!
- Get into the X’mas mood with the Sexy Santa GOGO Dancers
- Find your very special Merry Christmas Friend ;-)
- Simply Tokyo’s best Christmas Party for years!!!

12/23 (Sun) “Happy Christmas” X’Mas Party Tokyo @ VANDALISM Shibuya
20:30~23:30 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/bmJF5TfjASx
Address: Ota Bldg. B1F, 26-9 Udagawacho, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=xmas

12/24 (Mon) “Merry Xmas Baby” Christmas Party Tokyo @ CROSSPOINT Shibuya
20:00~23:00 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/LJ8vR22nN452
Address: J+R Bldg. SideR 3F, 33-12 Udagawacho, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=christmas

12/25 (Tue) “Last Christmas” X’mas Party Tokyo @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya
20:00~23:00 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/DnEzoTkwUAz
Address: SK PLAZA Bldg. B1F, 1-17-9 Dogenzaka, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=christmas_party

12/28 …TBA…

12/29 (Sat) NEW International Friends Party Tokyo @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya
20:00~23:00 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/DnEzoTkwUAz
Address: SK PLAZA Bldg. B1F, 1-17-9 Dogenzaka, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=shibuya_friends_party

12/31 (Mon) Countdown Party Tokyo 2018-2019 @ CLUB MAHARAJA Roppongi * All-You-Can-Drink
20:00~5:00 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/6Bd9WbdqXC72
Address: Roppongi Plaza Bldg. 5F, 3-12-6 Roppongi, Minato-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=countdownparty
